Posts.Content: I had all those procedures three months ago and am also a baby. They hurt me a lot the biopsy took me a good month to get over and heck it's been three months since my mast. and reconstruction. If if hurts you it hurts dont feel bad just get through it as best you can Lisa
Posts.Title: Sentinel Node Biopsy

Posts.Content: Tamoxifen has a half life of 6 week so for 3 weeks you will still notice effects. I went of last week because I just was too emotional and couldnt sleep because of the hot flashes. I feel so much better I'll take the risk for quality of life.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Tamoxifen has a half life of 6 week so for 3 weeks you will still notice effects. I went of last week because I just was too emotional and couldnt sleep because of the hot flashes. I feel so much better I'll take the risk for quality of life.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: I had the procedure done last jan at Rush in Chicago I have had good results and will need some fine tuning done but I look pretty good.  My doctor was sami bittar.  I do recommend going to someone who has done a lot of these surgies ask your doctor how many he/she does my doctor  was doing about one a week last year.   I wouldn't go to someone doing any less. Good luck  Lisa
Posts.Title: diep surgery

Posts.Content: I just went off tamoxifin for a different reason (i couldn't sleep). I was told the half life is 3 weeks so you should have no effect until then it takes 6 weeks for it to be totally gone. I have super fast metabolism and felt it in three days. I got very depressed but a little efferix (sp) anti depressant helped that. It was like super bad PMS. I only took the anti depresant for one day but it did help. Make sure some one you trust watches out for you next week.
Posts.Title: Life After Treatment and Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: One more thing insurance paid for the diep surgery just not the tummy tuck.  I did have that done to avoid loose skin it was 6000.
Posts.Title: diep surgery

Posts.Content: Hang in there. You're reaction is completely normal. You will make it through the biopsy with a little pain just plan on taking it easy. I had mine in dec and still hosted my 10 year olds birthday party. My big advice is get the best medical advice you can. Lisa
Posts.Title: What is Normal?

Posts.Content: I had this surgery in Jan 06 I'm doing ok I had problems with fat necrosis which is when the blood supply wasnt enough and the tissue dies. I also needed physical therapy and have been doing pt for 10 weeks so far. It has really helped. I didnt have the suture issue as much but did have some minor adhesion of the scar. Vit e and massage worked well. Take it easy and take care it could be a year of recovery.
Posts.Title: Diep Flap Reconstruction

Posts.Content: I life 1 pound weights (it's a big deal) a lot of massage an arm bike (bike for you arms). I'm a big gardener also I tried this year what a mess I got so crabby I just did it and boy it hurt, I dont remember what I planted and its all messed up. I think swimming would help too, Im also doing the 3 day walk in sept and walking has really helped get blood flow and strechting. The good thing is my tummy is oh so flat now.
Posts.Title: Diep Flap Reconstruction

Posts.Content: I had a core biopsy and it was very painfull almost worse than when I had my masteomy. It took about a month and I was fine. Take it easy.
Posts.Title: While im Waiting For my Results

Posts.Content: You should try typing free mammograms phoenix az I did this lots of sites that offer services for uninsured and underinsured. Good luck
Posts.Title: Can't Seem to Get Help Getting a Mammogram

Posts.Content: My reconstruction involved lyposuction to my stomach fat which was used to create a new breast with microsurgery if you google diep flap you'll get lots of info. There is feeling but not like before my arm motion is almost back to normal with six months of pt. I do have some minor swelling they removed three lymph nodes. Lisa
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy Vs. Mastectomy

Posts.Content: I had stage 1 dcis and was going to have lumpectomy but ended up with the mastemony because the cancer was bigger than they thought. I had diep flap reconstruction done that day and an 9 months out. I do feel it was the better choice. I didnt have radiation or chemo just surgery. It was a lot of pain at first but with physical therapy alot of the pain has gone away. I was on tamoxofin (yuck) i couldnt handle it and went off. Best of luck to you It will be okay youre early Lisa
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy Vs. Mastectomy

Posts.Content: Tamofin stinks maybe not for everyone but it sure did for me and no one believed a premenapausal woman had the symptons I did. I went off it and wont look back
Posts.Title: What Would Happen If...
